title: [Lava Flows, Windy Turn]
description: Winds sweeping around the northern face of the volcano shred the smoke and fumes here.  A plain of ash is barely visible through the wisps and tatters of the volcano's exhalations.
Winds sweeping around the northern face of the volcano shred the smoke and fumes here.  An unnatural plain of pale yellow ash is visible through the wisps and tatters of the volcano's exhalations.
